0.message: Story mode will walk you through several important observations about a network's performance in the past year. Click the 'Next' or 'Prev' buttons to move through each of the slides/observations. Feel free to interact with either graphic during the story. You can exit story mode at anytime by clicking the 'X' above.

1.name: THE MURDER
1.message: THE MURDER was the highest rated series in 2017 with a 0.75 rating across 7 premiere hours.

2.name: WITCH
2.message: WITCH was #2, though represented less than 1 hour of programming.

3.name: MODERN OF PERFECT
3.message: Last year (2016), MODERN OF PERFECT was the #1 series at a 0.73 rating for the 1 hour special.

4.name: MODERN OF PERFECT
4.message: In 2017, MODERN OF PERFECT was much lower rated (0.36 rating), though again only featured minimal premiere hours.

5.message: Repeat hours are very important to the overall Prime story for the year, reprsenting 78% of the total Prime hours. Lets change our pie chart to duration-based to see which shows contributed the most number of hours.

6.message: The pie chart is now reflecting duration, with the largest spikes representing the shows with the most number of Prime hours.

7.name: RIDER OF BAD
7.message: RIDER OF BAD repeats were the biggest contributors to Prime in terms of number of hours, with a total of 111 hours in 2017.

8.name: A PATCH
8.message: A PATCH was the 2nd most widely utilized series for Prime repeats, with 85 repeat hours.
